title: 6.18 crash to client just after fountain spawn
body: So in this patch I always crash out of League of Legends in game back to the client prompting me that League of Legends has crashed but I can still reconnect to my game and have no issues further on. It's really annoying that it happens on any game modes every single time I play. I have tried fixing the client and re-installing my graphics drivers to no avail. Thankfully I have League of Legends on my SSD so reconnecting back to the game takes only a few seconds. I will try to re-install League of Legends some time later.

replies.body: It happens to me to, but every time i go back to the fountain I crash again.
Having the same problem,i don't know what to do... Please help
